topics.body:
Now that the dust has settled on Scottish Independence it is easier to find impartial articles and sources on the subject.

While I usually like the self determination of a people, it is not so simple in this case.
Salmond, a former maoist (important later, not poisoning the well), lied and used divisive tactics to further his cause.

From what I understand, most celtic nationalist groups have a fascistic hatred for the English and he took advantage of this as part of his perpetual revolution thing. Something Mao was known for. 

Also Scotland's government is very much in debt and not even the most generous forecasts for North Sea oil would not have fixed that.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f
